name: Toshiba-Projector
author: Brendan Coles <bcoles@gmail.com>
description: Toshiba mobile and conference room projector

matches.regexp: (?-mix:<TD class="f12w" width="229" height="30"><FONT color="#666666"><B>MAC address<\/B><\/FONT><\/TD>[\s]+<TD class="f12w" valign="middle" width="217" height="30">([\dA-Z]{12})<\/TD>)
(?-mix:<TD class="f12w" width="229" height="30"><FONT color="#666666"><B>Version<\/B><\/FONT><\/TD>[\s]+<TD class="f12w" valign="middle" width="217" height="30">([^<]+)<\/TD>)
